translations: n.<正式>潜力，潜能；<正式>潜在性，可能性

phrs.translation: 潜能, 潜力, 势差, 潜在性

sentences.sentence: All of these are useful breeds whose potentiality has not been realized.
sentences.translation: 所有这些都是有益的品种，其潜力尚未被认识到。

sentences.sentence: It is dead; it is just a potentiality.
sentences.translation: 它是死的；它只是以潜能的态存在。

sentences.sentence: These caves have large exploration potentiality.
sentences.translation: 这些洞穴具有较大的开发潜力。
